summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the improvement of W. Emerson St. from 25th Ave. W. to 24th Ave. W.; and a certain other Avenue and an Alley, by Constructing Sanitary Sewers and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 26163 of the City Council of the City of Seattle; creating a Local improvement District Therefor, and Providing That Payment for Said Improvement Be Made by Special Assessments Upon Property In Said District Payable by the Mode of "Payment By Bonds."
